column2: # p <- ggplot(hist.df, aes(x = samples, y = SR)) +
#     ) + ggtitle('richness in conventional clusters\n')+ theme(axis.text = element_text(angle = 90))
geom_col(aes(x = samples, y = SR, fill = stringr::str_sub(samples, -2, -1))) +
theme_light() + theme(axis.text = element_text(angle = 90))+ ggtitle('richness in nutrient clusters\n')
geom_col(aes(x = samples, y = PD, fill = stringr::str_sub(samples, -2, -1))) +
theme_light() + theme(axis.text = element_text(angle = 90))+ ggtitle('Faiths diversity in nutrient clusters')
#boxplot-- Is PD changing in PRE and POST?
# one box per U1 and U2
pn2 <- ggplot(nutr.pd, aes(x = group, y = PD, fill = group)) +
pn2.o <- ggplot(nutr.pd, aes(x = group, y = PD, fill = group)) +
#boxplot-- Is richness changing in PRE and POST?
# one box per U1 and U2
hn2 <- ggplot(nutr.hist, aes(x = group, y = SR, fill = group)) +
